title: Describe a memorable shopping experience you had. What made it special?

korean: 작년 생일에 백화점 가서 명품 가방 하나 샀어.
생일 기념으로 나한테 선물 주고 싶어서 용기 냈어.
매장 들어가니까 직원분이 엄청 친절하게 응대해 줬어.
여러 모델 보여주면서 어떤 게 나한테 어울릴지 추천해 줬어.
한 시간 넘게 고민하다가 블랙 컬러로 결정했어.
가격 보고 한 번 더 고민했는데, 그냥 질러버렸어.
카드 긁는 순간 심장이 쫄깃했지만, 동시에 기분 좋았어.
예쁘게 포장해 줘서 선물 받은 것 같은 느낌이었어.
집에 와서 거울 앞에서 몇 번이나 메고 보니 진짜 예뻤어.
비싼 만큼 아껴 쓰려고 특별한 날에만 들고 나가.
지금 생각해도 후회 없는 쇼핑이었어, 오래오래 쓸 거야.
english: On my birthday last year, I went to a department store and bought, like, a luxury bag.
I usually wanted to buy it, but I hesitated because it was expensive.
I wanted to give myself a gift to commemorate my birthday, so I, you know, gathered courage.
When I entered the store, the staff greeted me very kindly.
They showed me various models and recommended which one would suit me.
After thinking for over an hour, I decided on the black color.
I looked at the price and thought about it once more, but I just went for it.
The moment I swiped my card, my heart was pounding, but, well, at the same time I felt good.
They wrapped it beautifully, so it felt like I received a gift.
When I came home and looked in the mirror several times with it on, it was really pretty.
Since it's expensive, I try to take care of it and only carry it out on special days.
Even now, it was shopping without regret, I mean, I'll use it for a long time.
